description:
As there are many projects you can start out with, you can learn the basics by making a game where you are simply clicking things.

You may ask what is one of the most simple popular games that possess this aspect?

Cookie Clicker.

Cookie Clicker was a famous game back in 2013-2014 where you simply clicked cookies. Even though it's concept was incredibly simple it became incredibly famous.

Anyone who wants to start out to the smallest should make a clicking game. This is the easiest game you will ever make for starting out.


If you are a person who wants to get into programming or want to learn how to make Gamemaker: Studio games but don't know where to start, buy this course now!
title: Make A Cookie Clicker Clone In Gamemaker Studio
